# Getting started: Tennis data

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse) #loads package
library(DescTools)
library(effectsize)
library(pwr)
tennis <- read_csv("wimbledon_featured_matches.csv") #loads data
```

```{r}
glimpse(tennis)
```
